mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_DOC_TYPE WHERE PK_DOCTYPE = #{pkDoctype,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_DOC_TYPE where nvl(py_code,'%') like '%${pyCode}%' or nvl(d_code,'%') like '%${dCode}%' order by code

SELECT * FROM EMR_DOC_TYPE WHERE del_flag!='1'
and (eu_visit = '0' or eu_visit=#{euVisit,jdbcType=CHAR})
and (eu_used='0' or eu_used=#{euUsed,jdbcType=CHAR})
and (nvl(flag_home_page,'0')=0 or (flag_home_page='1' and reserve=#{wmTcmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
and (levels=#{levels,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
ORDER BY sort_num,code,name
SELECT * FROM EMR_DOC_TYPE WHERE levels='2' and del_flag!='1' and eu_visit in ('0','2') and eu_used in ('0','1') ORDER BY sort_num,code,name
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO EMR_DOC_TYPE
PK_DOCTYPE,
PK_ORG,
CODE,
NAME,
PARENT_TYPE,
LEVELS,
PY_CODE,
D_CODE,
WS_CODE,
EU_VISIT,
EU_USED,
SORT_NUM,
TITLE,
FLAG_COURSE,
FLAG_FIRST,
FLAG_NEW_PAGE,
FLAG_HOME_PAGE,
DEL_FLAG,
PK_DEPT,
PK_WARD,
RESERVE,
REMARK,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
TS,

mapper.update:
UPDATE EMR_DOC_TYPE
PK_DOCTYPE = #{pkDoctype,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_ORG = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_TYPE = #{parentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVELS = #{levels,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PY_CODE = #{pyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
D_CODE = #{dCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WS_CODE = #{wsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EU_VISIT = #{euVisit,jdbcType=CHAR},
EU_USED = #{euUsed,jdbcType=CHAR},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_COURSE = #{flagCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_FIRST = #{flagFirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_NEW_PAGE = #{flagNewPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_HOME_PAGE = #{flagHomePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_DEPT = #{pkDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PK_WARD = #{pkWard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE = #{reserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=DATE},
WHERE PK_DOCTYPE = #{pkDoctype,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAGRAPH WHERE PK_PARA = #{pkPara,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAGRAPH where py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or d_code like '%${dCode}%' order by code
SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAGRAPH where del_flag!='1' order by code

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_DATA_ELEMENT WHERE PK_ELEMENT = #{pkElement,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_DATA_ELEMENT

SELECT PK_ELEMENT, PK_ORG, CODE, NAME, PY_CODE, D_CODE, EU_DATA_TYPE, EU_PRE_FORMAT, EU_CTRL_TYPE, WS_CODE, EU_CODE_TYPE, CODE_VALUE, EU_DICT_TYPE, DICT_CODE, SORT_NUM, DE_VALUE_LIST, edge_style, edge_style2, flag_edge, flag_del_protect, flag_edit_protect, help_tip, title, SHORT_NAME, flag_is_ctrl_hidden, PLACE_HOLDER, TEXT, flag_must_fill_content, flag_print_able, FLAG_IS_NOT_IN_XML, flag_view_secret, max_len, max_value, MIN_VALUE, preci, num_unit, NUM_ERR_INPUT_INFO, NUM_OUT_RANGE_INFO, check_box_status, check_pos, eu_date_format, DEFINITION, FONT_NAME, eu_font_size, eu_font_type, eu_align_type, Repulsion_For_Group, REMARK, IMG_INDEX, DEL_FLAG, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, TS FROM EMR_DATA_ELEMENT where del_flag!='1' order by code

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_DICT_CODE WHERE PK_DICTCODE = #{pkDictcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_DICT_CODE

SELECT bd.pk_defdoc pk_dictcode,bd.pk_org,bd.code_defdoclist pk_dictcls,bd.code,bd.name,bd.py_code,bd.d_code, bd.memo remark,bd.shortname as value,bd.creator,bd.create_time,bd.del_flag,bd.ts, bd.ba_code,bd.ba_code sort_num,bd.ba_code gb_code FROM bd_defdoc bd where bd.code_defdoclist=#{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nvl(bd.del_flag,'0')!='1' order by bd.ba_code,bd.code
SELECT cd.* FROM EMR_DICT_CODE cd,EMR_DICT_CLASS cls where cd.PK_DICTCLS=cls.PK_DICTCLS and cls.code=#{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cd.del_flag!='1' order by cd.sort_num,cd.code

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_DICT_RANGE_CODE WHERE PK_RANGE_CODE = #{pkRangeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT code.* FROM EMR_DICT_RANGE_CODE code,EMR_DICT_RANGE class WHERE code.pk_range=class.pk_range and (class.pk_range= #{pkRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or class.code= #{pkRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and code.del_flag!='1' order by code.sort_num,code.code

PY_CODE = #{pyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
D_CODE = #{dCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GB_CODE = #{gbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=DATE},
WHERE PK_RANGE_CODE = #{pkRangeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAMETER WHERE PK_PARAM = #{pkParam,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAMETER

SELECT pk_sysparam pk_param,pk_org,code,name,null py_code,null d_code,val as value,null short_name,desc_param p_value,0 sort_num,note remark,'0' flag_show,del_flag,creator,create_time,ts FROM bd_sysparam where del_flag!='1'
and (pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or pk_org like '~%')
and exists (select 1 from bd_sysparam_temp where bd_sysparam_temp.dt_pacate ='07' and bd_sysparam.pk_paramtemp=bd_sysparam_temp.pk_paramtemp) order by pk_org,code

SELECT * FROM EMR_PARAMETER where del_flag!='1'
and pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /*or pk_org like '~%'*/
order by pk_org,sort_num,code
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO EMR_PARAMETER
PK_PARAM,
PK_ORG,
CODE,
NAME,
VALUE,
SHORT_NAME,
P_VALUE,
SORT_NUM,
REMARK,
FLAG_SHOW,
DE_FLAG,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
TS,

#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{ts,jdbcType=DATE},

PK_PARAM = #{pkParam,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_ORG = #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_VALUE = #{pValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_SHOW = #{flagShow,jdbcType=CHAR},
DE_FLAG = #{deFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=DATE},
WHERE PK_PARAM = #{pkParam,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMR_SWITCH WHERE PK_SWITCH = #{pkSwitch,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_SWITCH

SELECT pk_sysparam pk_switch,pk_org,code,name,val as value,note remark,del_flag,creator,create_time,ts FROM bd_sysparam where del_flag!='1'
and (pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or pk_org like '~%')
and desc_param='0~1' and exists (select 1 from bd_sysparam_temp where bd_sysparam_temp.dt_pacate ='07' and bd_sysparam.pk_paramtemp=bd_sysparam_temp.pk_paramtemp) order by pk_org,code

SELECT pk_sysparam pk_switch,pk_org,code,name,val as value,note remark,del_flag,creator,create_time,ts FROM bd_sysparam where del_flag!='1' and code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or pk_org like '~%')

SELECT * FROM EMR_SWITCH where del_flag!='1'
and pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} /*or pk_org like '~%'*/
order by pk_org,code

mapper.select: SELECT nvl(value,0) as sys_sn FROM EMR_SN_GENERATOR WHERE CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select * from bd_term_diag d where d.diagcode not in (select kb.code from emr_knowledge_base kb where kb.del_flag='0') and d.dt_system in ('00','10') and d.del_flag='0' and (d.diagcode like '%${diagcode}%' or d.diagname like '%${diagname}%' or d.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or d.d_code like '%${dCode}%')

select d.pk_diag,d.diagcode,d.diagname from bd_term_diag d,emr_knowledge_base kb where d.del_flag='0' and kb.code = d.diagcode and kb.kb_text is not null and (kb.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or kb.d_code like '%${dCode}%') group by d.pk_diag,d.diagcode,d.diagname order by d.diagcode

select * from EMR_DATA_ELEMENT el where (el.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or el.d_code like '%${dCode}%' or el.name like '%${name}%' or el.code like '%${code}%') and instr('${euCtrlType}',el.eu_ctrl_type)>0 order by el.code

select * from EMR_DATA_ELEMENT el where (el.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or el.d_code like '%${dCode}%' or el.name like '%${name}%' or el.code like '%${code}%') and charindex(convert(varchar(20),el.eu_ctrl_type), '${euCtrlType}') > 0 order by el.code
select * from emr_parameter where pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by code
select * from emr_switch where pk_org like #{pkOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by code
SELECT * FROM EMR_DICT_CLASS cl where (cl.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or cl.d_code like '%${dCode}%') order by cl.sort_num

select co.pk_dictcode, co.pk_org, co.pk_dictcls, co.code, co.name, co.py_code, co.d_code, co.gb_code, co.value, co.sort_num, co.del_flag, (case co.remark when null then '' end) as remark from emr_dict_code co where co.pk_dictcls=#{pkDictcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by co.sort_num
select * from emr_dict_range r where (r.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or r.d_code like '%${dCode}%') order by r.sort_num

select co.pk_range_code, co.pk_org, co.pk_range, co.code, co.name, co.py_code, co.d_code, gb_code, co.sort_num, co.del_flag, (case co.remark when null then '' end) as remark from emr_dict_range_code co where co.pk_range=#{pkRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by co.sort_num

select doc.*,c.name consult_name,d.name director_name from emr_doctor doc left outer join view_emr_emp_list c on c.pk_emp = doc.consult left outer join view_emr_emp_list d on d.pk_emp = doc.director WHERE doc.PK_EMP = #{pkEmp,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM EMR_DOCTOR

mapper.select: select * from emr_grade_rule r where (r.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or r.d_code like '%${dCode}%') order by r.code
select distinct code,name,max(py_code) py_code,max(d_code) d_code from emr_knowledge_base where del_flag!='1' group by code,name order by code,name

select * from emr_common_words where ((pk_dept=#{pkDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and eu_level=1) or (creator=#{pkEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and eu_level=2) or (eu_level=0)) and nvl(del_flag,'0')!='1' order by sort_num,pk_cword,name

mapper.select:
select * from emr_grade_standard s where (s.py_code like '%${pyCode}%' or s.d_code like '%${dCode}%')
and s.SCORE_XML IS NOT NULL AND length(nvl(s.SCORE_XML,'')) > 0
order by s.code
